categories: Category:Admirals and generals of Revan's Sith Empire

nodes.text: An individual served as an admiral in the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Revan's Sith Empire during the Jedi Civil War, a galactic conflict between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. The admiral served as commander of the entire Sith fleet. At some point during the war, the admiral questioned the orders from Revan's Sith apprentice, Darth Malak, prompting the Sith Lord to remove the admiral from the position in the Sith armada. Some time after the year 3958 BBY, Revan installed the former Republic admiral Saul Karath, who had defected to the Sith Empire from the Republic, as the commander of the entire fleet.
Karath's predecessor was first mentioned in the 2003 Xbox and PC video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, which was developed by BioWare.
